page.title: 14FARMING AT BEESTHORPE HALL
page.content: The study group interviewed{Andrew {Stewart }owner of Beesthorpe Hall Farm. Andrew Stewart has run his own farm for 24 years. He enjoys his job.He said it is hard work at times but he still likes it.It gets very hard work at harvest time. He has been an arable farmer for 9 years.His main crop is rape,wheat and barley. When he was with his father they used to have sheep and had to be up at first light and would go to bed at dark. He has 153 acres of land and he uses it all for crops except for 2 acres of land infront of his house .
